areas.name: Entrance
areas.desc: You are standing in the labyrinth entrance. A brave adventurer will never step back in horror.

areas.name: Dark Forest
areas.desc: You are standing in a dark forest. All you can see is the endless darkness.

areas.name: Silent Hill
areas.desc: Absolute silence. Seems like no one would ever want to live in such a creepy place.

areas.name: Exit
areas.desc: You are now reached the end of the labyrinth. Hopefully you have found the treasure.

items.name: Flashlight
items.desc: There is a flashlight on the ground.
items.useDesc: You turned on the flashlight. Now you can see!

items.name: Pepper Spray
items.desc: There is a pepper spray on the ground.
items.useDesc: You used your pepper spray on the monster. The monster fled away in panic.

items.name: Aegis
items.desc: This is...AEGIS!!!...an invaluable gift Zeus gave to Athena. You have found the treasure!!!
items.useDesc: May the Olympian Gods and Goddesses bless you.

items.name: Boat
items.desc: There is a small boat parking near you.
items.useDesc: You sat on the boat. Now you can paddle around.

hazards.name: Darkness
hazards.desc: You cannot even see your own fingers in such darkness!

hazards.name: Deadly Swamp
hazards.desc: Help...Help...Help...You are stuck in the swamp and cannot move unless you have a boat.

monster.name: Pale Man
monster.desc: a creepy monster with eyes on his hands.
